description: A React-like component definition for a top navigation bar ('TopNav') using Blits UI framework. It includes visual elements such as brand text, a placeholder for accessibility, and a right-side action area, utilizing theme and Lightning.js components.

classes.name: TopNav
classes.description: A top navigation bar component with title, accessibility anchor, and action placeholder, styled with theme tokens.

methods.name: barColor
methods.description: Computes the background color of the top bar using a theme token value.

methods.name: titleColor
methods.description: Returns the color used for the title text.

methods.name: rightX
methods.description: Calculates the X position for the right-side action element.

methods.name: buttonBg
methods.description: Provides the background color for the button area using a theme color.

methods.name: buttonAlpha
methods.description: Returns the alpha transparency value for the button element.
